name: @etaletai13/gmc-bin
description: makes available go-musicoin binaries in node projects

scripts.build: yarn build.darwin/386 && yarn build.darwin/amd64 && yarn build.windows
scripts.build.darwin/386: cd go-musicoin && build/env.sh go run build/ci.go xgo -- --go=latest --targets=darwin/386 -v --dest ../ ./cmd/gmc
scripts.build.darwin/amd64: cd go-musicoin && build/env.sh go run build/ci.go xgo -- --go=latest --targets=darwin/amd64 -v --dest ../ ./cmd/gmc
